bookSourceComment:
需登录
◎搜索格式◎
1、搜索用户<关闭精确搜索>
@用户名
2、搜索合集<关闭精确搜索>
#合集
3、搜索粮单
%粮单名<关闭精确搜索>
4、搜索文章，直接搜索

发现规则格式
                                    🏷标签
标签名::https://api.lofter.com/oldapi/tagPosts.api?product=lofter-android-6.13.0&method=newTagSearch&offset={{(page-1) *22}}&limit=22&firstpermalink=null&tag=标签名&type=new,{"method": "POST","body":"null"}
📃用户（搜索可以得到)
部分目录章节比较多，加载时间久，出现目录加载失败，请尝试刷新，因为可能是请求失败导致的

ruleBookInfo.author: $.response.blogInfo.blogNickName||$.response.posts[0].post.blogInfo.blogNickName||$.data.blogInfo.blogNickName
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header));
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.response.collection.name

ruleContent.content: if(/\.mp4/.test(baseUrl)){ result = "请点击章节链接观看视频\n视频链接："+baseUrl }else{ content = java.getString("$..content"); imgs = eval(String(java.getString("$..photoLinks"))); video =/video_down_url\\":\\"(.*?)\\"/.test(result)? "视频链接："+String(result).match(/video_down_url\\":\\"(.*?)\\"/)[1]:""; img = ""; imgs?imgs.forEach(x=>{ x?img += "\n":"" }):"" result = content + "\n"+img+"\n"+video; } if(result =="\n\n"){ result = "{{$..msg}}" }
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
if(!/myReturnGift/.test(baseUrl)){
try{
		id = java.getString("$..post.id");
		id2 = java.getString("$..post.blogId");
url ="https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/post/newSupportInfo?postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2+"&openFansVipPlan=0&vipFans=0";
//java.log(JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(url))).code)
	$  = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(url)));
//	java.log(JSON.stringify($))
	l = $.data.gainReturnGifts.length?$.data.gainReturnGifts:$.data.returnGifts;
	ls = []
	l.forEach(x=>{
		url = "https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/myReturnGift?id="+x.id+"&postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2;
		ls.push(url)
		})
	result = ls
	}catch(e){
		}
	}
</js>

ruleExplore.author: $.post.blogInfo.blogNickName
ruleExplore.name: $.post.title||$.post.noticeLinkTitle||$.post.digest||$.post.blogInfo.blogId||$.post.blogPageUrl##</*\w.*?>

ruleSearch.author: $.blogInfo.blogNickName||$.blogName
ruleSearch.name: $.title||$.noticeLinkTitle||$.digest||$.blogInfo.blogNiceName||$.blogNickName||$.name##</*\w.*?>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
list=[];
if(/limit=500/.test(baseUrl)){
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}
}else if(/api-grain/.test(baseUrl)){
	offset = "{{$.data.offset}}";
	if(offset!="-1"){
	list = baseUrl.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+offset);
}
	}
list
</js>
